author: felicity
msg: properly deal with decoding post results -- allows for complete client/server run now... :)

author: ltheussl
msg: Documentation bug: Maven 1.0 compat has been fixed.

author: andreas
msg: Avoid NPE in menu XSP when document is null, return original source URI in usecase when source document is not referenced in site structure.

author: josias
msg: removed the exit usecase, because this usecase may be called from either the authoring or the site view, and the exit usecase is defined by a parameter in the menu

author: josias
msg: only recreate the usecase proxy if the usecase has not finished yet. (if the usecase has finished, the creation of the usecase proxy may fail, because e.g. in the case of the delete-language usecase, the document does not exist anymore)
